English & Arabic – Fluent

CAREER SUMMARY
2015 to date Fortinet – Riyadh, KSA
Position: Professional Services Consultant
Network Security Consultation & delivery of Professional Services projects, working closely with PMO team to ensure successful completion of projects.
Provide professional, timely services for Fortinet clients such as:
Recommending and implementing Fortinet best practices.
Organizing ad-hoc workshops.
Creating network security infrastructure designs.
Developing and maintaining project documentation such as high/low level design documentation, method of procedure, test plans, configuration templates, and scripts.
Installing, provisioning, customizing equipment according to design specifications.
Integrating security components, including scripts development.
Verifying Fortinet configurations based on recommended and approved design.
Delivering knowledge transfer to client staff.
Assisting PMO during project scoping.
Develop new skills based on business requirements.
Maintain and develop competency on Fortinet’s entire product line and technologies.
Some of major projects with Fortinet are listed below:
STC Firewall and FortiWeb deployment.
Jarir Book Store security solution.
Royal Commission for Jubail: Firewall migration from Cisco to Fortinet and FortiAnalyzer.
NIC: WiFi project.
STC: LTE Secure GateWay.
Al Rajhi Bank: New Data Center, 6 clusters of firewalls – migration and deployment.
2013 – 2015 Saudi Telecommunication Company (STC) – Riyadh, KSA
Position: Information Security Advisor
Assist in developing & maintaining IT Security related procedures. Advise on the acquirement of IT security related technology architecture. Evaluate IT security related technology architecture. Perform Security risk assessment for the department-initiated projects.
Propose IT Security technology direction & new security initiatives (Technology watch).
Evaluate and advise on the acquirement of IT security related software.
Participate in the definition of contractors’ scope of work, develop RFP technical content, and participate in the selection of contractors.
Design ‘best of breed’ IT Security Controls in line with the requirements of the business and in support of GDIS strategy.
Perform security solution modeling and prototyping and testing of new security solutions/equipment and security design modifications.
Define technical access controls to minimize security risks.
Manage implementation and deployment of network infrastructures and services.
Define security process management framework and methodology.
Evaluation of policy and procedures practice within organization.
Developed and implemented Enterprise Security Awareness Program which addresses organization’s needs and effective implementation to change employees’ attitudes towards information security issues.
Reports and updates and status reports to senior management.
Designing and developing different modules and providing proper interfaces between them to help ensure the high cohesion and low coupling.
Participating in development of test plans for unit testing and formal testing.
3rd level support for SOC (Security Operation Center).
Providing Bulk SMS and MMS service to S

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
